item.title: Tutorial: Tips regarding Web accessibility
item.description: Tutorial: Tips regarding Web accessibility Whenever I browse personal websites, it’s often I notice a lack of thought from their Webmasters when it comes to browsing the Web in a way different than their own. Back when I hosted my sites on Neocities, I ended up learning a lot about Web accessibility and why it matters. I very firmly believe that the indie Web shouldn’t be gatekept from people who genuinely want to learn more about it, especially if it’s over something they can’t control.
